Email_address_in_login.description: No=(Default) Do Not; or Yes = e-mail address is mandatory in create-user and show it in login/sign-in page. With this feature (2 screens with one difference to show a change ), BPT shows that if there is one change in one page, if it was defined as a component, the user can change this component only, and not touch all tests like in UFT.

Generate_memory_leak.description: Generates a memory leak in retrieve of user orders history, 0=(Default) Disabled; any other positive number multiply by 1k per user.

Repeat_ShipEx_call.description: Perform the same call to ShipEx multiple times (place shipping order - from Order service to ShipEx). Parameter values: 0=(Default) Disabled; any other positive number is the number of repeat calls to ShipEx. The goal of this capability is to find multiple calls to the same methods usually done by multiple developers causing inefficient application.

Sum_to_add_to_cart_calculation.description: 0=(Default) Disabled; any other number is the sum to add to cart calculation when the user is logged in. UI only, Web and mobiles.

Add_wrong_product_to_speakers_category.description: No=(Default) Disabled; Yes = Move product-id=13 from Headphones category to Speakers category. UI and API.

Spelling_mistakes_in_order_payment_page.description: In order payment page change 'SHIPPING DETAILS' to 'SHIPING DETAILS', 'Receiver Details' to 'Reciever Details', 'City' to 'Ciity', 'ORDER SUMMARY' to 'ORDERR SUMMARY'. Parameter values: No=(Default) Do nothing; Yes=make spelling mistakes in order payment page. Web and mobile.

Max_concurrent_sessions.description: (-1)=(Default) 1K; any other number is the number of concurrentSessions.

Mix_pictures_in_home_page.description: No=(Default) Do nothing; Yes=Mix places of pictures in home page. Android Only (to show different pages in each device).

Slow_DB_call.description: Create a stored procedure that retrieves the list of countries (in user registration) from the database and use it instead of the exiting Hibernate and Spring frameworks (for this action only). insert a delay in the procedure. Parameter values: 0=(Default) Disabled, any other positive number is the number of seconds to delay the Stored Procedure execution.

Slow_Page.description: *** NEED TO UPDATE*** No=(Default) Do not; Yes=show more than 40 seconds difference between WiFi and 3G in optimization report

Different_price_in_UI_and_API.description: Multiply each product price by 2, No=(Default) Do nothing; Yes=Front End takes the product price and doubles it (multiply the product price by 2) to show a difference in product price in API (DB, Web Back End) and UI (Front End)

SLA_Add_Delay_In_Add_To_Cart_Response_Ti.description: Create a delay in DB call, *** NEED TO UPDATE WHICH DB CALL ***. 0=(Default) Disabled, any other positive number = the number of seconds to add as a delay in response time. UI and API.

SLA_Number_Of_Sessions_To_Add_The_Delay.description: This parameter is enabled only if 'SLA_Add_Delay_In_Add_To_Cart_Response_Time' is greater than zero. The system will start adding the delay if the number of sessions will be higher than this value and will stop the delay when the number of sessions will go back down. Valid values: 0-n, default=20

user_second_wsdl.description: Whether to use the second WSDL in user registration page. Parameter values: NO=(Default) Don't use, Yes = Use the second WSDL request to register new user.

Show_error_500_in_update_cart.description: No=(Default) Do Not Show; or Yes=Show HTTP error code 500 when trying to update cart.
